▸ createListener(options?, handler)
src/index.js

Creates a TCP listener. The provided handler function will be called anytime a new incoming Connection has been successfully upgraded via upgrader.upgradeInbound.

createListener(options: any?, handler: function (Connection)): Listener
Parameters
options (any?)
handler (function (Connection))
Returns
Listener: A TCP listener
▸ filter(multiaddrs)
src/index.js

Takes a list of Multiaddrs and returns only valid TCP addresses

filter(multiaddrs: Array<Multiaddr>): Array<Multiaddr>
Parameters
multiaddrs (Array<Multiaddr>)
Returns
Array<Multiaddr>: Valid TCP multiaddrs
